mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.brand AS "brand", a.lab_id AS "labId", a.ip AS "ip", a.completed AS "completed", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.address AS "address", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_device( id, brand, lab_id, ip, completed, birthday, address, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{brand}, #{labId}, #{ip}, #{completed}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_device SET brand = #{brand}, lab_id = #{labId}, ip = #{ip}, completed = #{completed}, birthday = #{birthday}, address = #{address}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
